website_summaries.verdict: A tool with impressive power figures from a highly regarded company.
pros: Excellent amp hour and torque stats

customer_reviews.title: Amazing power
customer_reviews.text: Strong enough to remove the lug nuts on an International dump truck. Recommended torque of 475 to 600 ft lbs. It will also tighten the same nuts to within specs. but that takes a lot of impacts. I did not purchase this impact to remove truck wheels but had to try due to the advertised rating and it did the job. I have used it on tie-rod ends, pickup wheels, farm equipment etc and am very impressed. Much more convenient than hauling a compressor around and has enough power for many jobs. I purchased a pair of batteries at the local farm supply for $50 on a special and recommend having extras on hand.
customer_reviews.author: DR Patton

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a monster. I wouldn't have believed its power unless I saw it first hand. I had wheel studs that would not hammer all the way in. This impact pulled them the rest of the way through. It destroyed the lug nut doing so but that was a good trade off. I recommend this impact to anyone especially someone who doesn't have a huge air compressor in their garage.
customer_reviews.author: Tom D

customer_reviews.title: Reverse button location sucks
customer_reviews.text: Just received and used to get to ball joints on my Jeep Wrangler. This thing is powerful and removed all the nuts and bolts it took on both front sides. What I absolutely hate is the direction button location, you know to put it into reverse to loosen or forward to tighten, yeah well it's located right above the trigger and your hand will constantly end up switching it when trying to get those awkwardly placed nuts loose. Not sure why they placed it where they did, should be moved somewhere out of the way. If not for that, 5 stars all the way!
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Sixx

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: It is a heavy beast but the power output gives me the bumps... I love this tool. Used it all day and battery was still full. Took off my spindle nut on my rotor with no problems. I rotate my tires with ease now. This is expensive but you pay for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent gift - absolutely positively your father/husband will be happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Father's day. This is an excellent gift - absolutely positively your father/husband will be happy! This review is written by my husband. This tool is a blast with unparalleled power in my hand! Even on the second speed, not on the highest third, my SUV's lug nuts went out of the wheels within a portion of a second! I did not use this tool on the highest third speed, but according to my feelings, it will break any crankshaft bolt from the first turns. I was very pleased, very easy cordless operation, quiet, and super-powerful tool.
customer_reviews.author: TigerMom

customer_reviews.title: Great for about 8 months
customer_reviews.text: We had been very pleased with this impact wrench, bought it last November for a building project. We have attached hundreds of large fasteners for a large structural steel building project and it has performed very well. However, yesterday the anvil assembly broke. I was very please to find replacement anvil assemblies available on Amazon for a decent price so I'll still award 3 stars. Otherwise, it would've only gotten 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: PGS

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for the do-it-yourselfer
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for the money. I've had a few high torque impacts but none really had the torque to remove a 150 ft lbs lugs from my mustang even though they were all rated higher. I found out the degrees at which the lugs were can actually take more torque to remove even though they were torqued at 150 ft lbs. I've tried Dewalts 300 ft lbs impact and the lowes 500 ft lbs but neither would take off a cold torqued 150 ft lbs lug. I really wanted the Milwaukee but just couldn't justify the price difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Battery pac disappointing....
customer_reviews.text: The battery gun that comes with the impact wrench is the weak link...the battery pac actually falls apart because it cracks where the screw the plastic cracks overtime causing the battery pac to fall apart overtime time....it's an excellent wrench with the exception of the battery...
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Bonaby

customer_reviews.title: Super powerful and well built tool
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I mean, wow! Super powerful and well built tool. I've used it on my bushhog (bolts tightened with a breaker bar to several hundred pounds and this thing just took the nuts right off for me. Battery lasts a long time too. Really pleased with this tool.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!!! One of my best tool purchases... backed out an 11 year old crank shaft pulley bolt on a Mercedes with 200+ ft/lbs of torque on the second setting... never even tried the third setting, plenty of power to spare! Didn't even need to install the engine locking tool on the flywheel to keep the engine from spinning over just left it in gear.
customer_reviews.author: Russ V.

customer_reviews.title: Took off axel nut that broke my prybar
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace a CV axel on my suv, its a 04 and never had the cv replaced. The axel nut was rusted on, even with penetrating oil I couldn't get it off with my 32in prybar, it even caused my prybar head to snap. Put this thing on the third setting and the impact knocked the bolt loose and took it off in seconds. 100% worth it, using it instead of a prybar for now on.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great gun
customer_reviews.text: More torque than I'll ever need. Kit comes with tool + 5AH battery + charger and a small bag, which actually comes in handy. A lot of good stuff for the price. The gun is pretty big so you might wanna consider if you'll be using this in tight spaces. It's weight surprised me, but in a good way. My only complaint is that the 'safety' detent is kind of weak, doesn't take much to bump it. Not a bad problem though, buying this was probably a little overkill. I'd still recommend it, though.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: I highly doubt this can remove class 8 lug nuts based on the few times I've used it. But I haven't tried, nor will I probably ever try, so there's that. It does work well for what I got it for though, which is basic car and pickup maintenance. Takes wheel lug nuts off just fine, removed rusty shock absorber bolts easily. Cannot comment on battery life as I haven't run a battery down far enough... But it pulled 2 wheels off and 2 shocks off and put it all back in just fine. Battery still read full. Which I'd hope it would... Weighs about what it looks like it should, nothing crazy there. Overall good piece.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: FAN-FRIGEN-TASTIC IMPACT GUN!!! Replaced the need for my pneumatic impact driver
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the need for my $700 pneumatic Ingersoll Rand impact gun. Take wheels off without a problem, along with rusty suspension components, axle nuts, etc. Great tool, and paired with the larger 60v battery, its great!!
customer_reviews.author: Milan Mastracci

customer_reviews.title: Breaks the nut free or it breaks your wrist trying.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after killing a Ryobi impact wrench within one year. This thing will break free (or just break) any stubborn bolt, and it has so much power it feels like it might take your wrist with it on occasion. I've yet to kill the battery, but I typically only use it to swap a set of wheels over so it doesn't see heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: J T

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the 700/1200ftlbs claims.
customer_reviews.text: This lived up to the hype. I charged the 5AH battery, after using it to remove and replace 6 wheels, 6 brake jobs, 4 struts, 2 control arms, 2 hub bearings/axle nuts and partially put together a playset, it's down to 2/3 battery. It didn't struggle with anything. As expected, it's is a lot more front heavy and an exaggerated/harder to control impact action than a traditional air impact. I can still feather the trigger like an air impact. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Adams

customer_reviews.title: Powerful workhorse
customer_reviews.text: I've needed to do work on a few cars since purchasing this. Although it feels sturdy, it's not heavy and my arm hasn't felt tired after using it. I've pulled lug nuts off cars, sway bar links and used it to mend fence posts. I haven't needed it for heavy work but it's worked great on the moderate work I've needed. I haven't come close to using up the battery so I can't speak to how long it lasts but battery life is solid. I'll pick up another battery in the future but it's been fine with several hours of off and on work.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: I don't believe DeWalt made this... Seems like something NASA would produce
customer_reviews.text: The most powerful impact gun imaginable. Without exaggerating it shames my air tools. DeWalt new line of 20 Volt commercial products are light years ahead of the old 18 volts. If you have a use for an impact gun I strongly suggest giving this a shot , it's a prime item so you can always return it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great impact wrench
customer_reviews.text: Great impact, have used a similar Milwaukee, what I like about this is the three different speeds. I do recommend this. When I bought this it was an Amazon deal and I had been looking to buy this for some time. Decided to buy it and i am really pleased with the purchase. I have used it removing spindle hub nuts and wheels lug nuts. I don't do commercial engines like 18 wheeler tractors but for most automobile work I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Madera

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Love this thing. Don't even use my pneumatic one anymore. Amazing power. Can take it out in yard (5 acres) and use it on tractors, building swing sets and things for the kids, and no cord or hose. Love it. Used it several dozens of times and it has been flawless and never met a nut or bolt it couldn't free.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J.C. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great torque but...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toque but a toggle trigger switch would have been much better. The forward and reverse button is too easily hit by mistake. Other than that gun has enormous torque way more than the the 36V impact it replaces. Not had one automobile lug nut the it wouldn't remove instantly. Great gun!!
customer_reviews.author: S Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Truly impressed
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing driver. It has all the torque I need to work on my 16 year old truck. It has handled every tough job I’ve sent it’s way. So far the only 2 small cons I can think of is the size it’s a little bulky for tighter areas just need to get a little creative. The next one is the cost it’s a bit pricey for a one battery device wish it came with two batteries for the money but the charger is really quick so that helps.
customer_reviews.author: M-Rod

customer_reviews.title: Amazing amount of torque!
customer_reviews.text: As others have stated - this impact wrench is pretty amazing. I have yet to find anything it couldn't break loose. I purchased it because I'm building up a Jeep, and I was tired of spending time on stuck bolts. I figured I could also take it with me on the trail. I purchased the covers from Mac to protect it, and they fit well. My only complaint is that it's easy to accidentally hit the direction switch, especially with gloves on. I've just learned to be cautious.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M.

customer_reviews.title: Bought to replace my Harbor Freight 1/2” cordless impact
customer_reviews.text: After using the 1/2” earthquake xt from harbor freight, I upgraded to this impact. Likes: Variable speed trigger. Has 3 speed settings. Can borrow my coworkers 20v Mac tools battery’s if I forget to charge mine. Better warranty than the earthquake. Dislikes: I probably do, just can’t think of any. Update:oct 2019; Speed adjustment switch works some times, switches randomly when on lower setting. Extremely annoying, especially since I work on industrial equipment and mainly grade 5 bolts. I mainly use the impact to snug the fasteners then torque them to spec.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Had it on setting 2 and buzzed off a 36mm axle nut like it was nothing
customer_reviews.text: Power house.Had it on setting 2 and buzzed off a 36mm axle nut like it was nothing. Lug nuts are candyland for this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Has the guts to bust those nuts!
customer_reviews.text: You don't need that compressor anymore! This is it, I was skeptical about it, but this gun does the trick. No more 4 ways in the garage or driveway! If you are like me, and get calls from friends needing help with a brake job or similar, this thing packs the punch! I took all 4 wheels off and back on with no sweat at all, and still plenty of battery to do more! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony R Spencer

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite tool!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help with the front end rebuild on a Suburban. It loosened the axel nut and pitman arm nut without any hesitation. The battery stayed charged even with the high torque required to break some of the fasteners loose. I wish I would have bought one of these years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Powerful battery powered impact gun.
customer_reviews.text: The torque this impact wrench has is impressive. I used it to remove four bolts that had been spot welded in place on my jeep tow hitch. Each bolt had 5 spot welds to hold it in plsce and this tool broke the welds in just a few seconds. The initial trigger pull was not enough but after about 2 seconds you could feel the impact engage and simply bust the spot welds with absolutely no problem. I am looking forward to putting some real daily workload on this impact wrench!!! I will update when I get a feel for how long the battery lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Ebert

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt Work
customer_reviews.text: I just received my item and it seems to be faulty. I can actually hold a socket with my hands when operating the wrench. Cant loosen a car lug either! it just cant get anything loose. Just keeps making a weird noise. Never worked even once. So disappointed. I'm definitely returning it
customer_reviews.author: victor momoh

customer_reviews.title: Loved this tool at first
customer_reviews.text: Loved this tool at first. Worked great until I had problems with the battery. The impact would take off lug nuts but suddenly the battery would shut off and the impact kept running. When putting lugnuts on the tool would just stop randomly while tightening. I used a smaller 20v battery from my impact driver and the impact wrench did not do this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd Bought One Sooner
customer_reviews.text: So powerful. I tried displaying it on the mantle but that effort got shot down real quick. I mainly got for fast tire changes when on the trail. It's so powerful though you need to be careful. I tighted the spare down to tight and it twisted the bolt right off the tire carrier it was welded onto. My fault though, not the dewalts. Battery holds charge a long time.
customer_reviews.author: ah7771

customer_reviews.title: More powerful than the pnumatic driver it replaces
customer_reviews.text: Has more torque, no air hose, can be used in the field away from home, 3 torque settings and massive breakaway torque. Pneumatic has 300 FTLB of torque, this one has up to 700 FTLB and in addition 1200 FTLB of breakaway.
customer_reviews.author: The Cralls

customer_reviews.title: One word: Wow!!
customer_reviews.text: Where do I start? I absolutely love it. I've had two impact wrenches in the past, with the better one maxing at 340ft/lbs. This does over double that!! Before I bought it, I spent about a week doing research on it to make sure the 700ft/lbs wasn't a typo or overrated. I do roadside assistance and I'm now able to get lugs off and on in a snap. I removed lugs from a Ram 3500 one day, the guy was stunned at how effortlessly this tool did it. This thing is very powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Very portable, very powerful
customer_reviews.text: Don’t have to drag a compressor and hose around to different job sites anymore. This is a powerful tool, maybe not as strong as an air impact but strong enough to do a bearing job on a frontload washer👍
customer_reviews.author: Atomic Goats Breath

customer_reviews.title: Item as described shipped fast
customer_reviews.text: Lots of power! Very strong removes tire lugs and nuts that were torqued to almost 300 ft lbs. My only complete is the spot where the button to change direction is in a spot that I accidentally can hit it
customer_reviews.author: D. Foleno

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Love the torque this impact has. It’s the first cordless impact I’ve ever owned. Still kind of early in its life to see how it’s gonna hold up to being abused. But time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Wish i bought it years ago
customer_reviews.text: I was stupid to wait so long to invest in an impact. After getting this DeWalt impact there is nothing that can't be taken apart in seconds. Tires, flywheels, rusted bumpers, axle bolts, everything. Well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Dasan

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product!
customer_reviews.text: What a beast to remove rusted bolts! Used it to remove front frame to suspension frozen bolts and this removed them without any problem! Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Classic Mustang Resto HI

customer_reviews.title: Torquey and good break away. Great for at home
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on sale for like 240$ prime day. Very torquey and comes in handy where air compressor and hoses arnt handy. Plus you can paint it Red and call it A Mac one because they are the same.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Box Missing Charger and Battery!!
customer_reviews.text: The one star is for the fact that the box arrived missing the charger and battery!!! I suspect the product itself will get 5 stars, if I could use it - I have lots of DeWalt tools and am very happy with them. I needed this ASAP, and I'm totally dissatisfied with the whole Amazon experience now...
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Swisher

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and a fair price!
customer_reviews.text: Great took for my job.... I'm a heavy haul driver and to put our Goldhofer trailers together involves dozens of 33mm bolts be torqued down to 250# . This DeWalt definitely is perfect for the job!
customer_reviews.author: Roy B

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: A little heavy but worth it.Will snap 1/2" bolts tightening if your not careful. Did a body lift on a 23 year old truck an had no problem. Pleasure to work with no hose for a change. Buy an extra battery as I did so you don't have to wait and you'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Desiderio

customer_reviews.title: Torque-y and portable.  Saves much time for shade tree mechanics.
customer_reviews.text: I love my DEWALT DCF899P1 20V MAX XR Brushless High Torque 1/2" Impact Wrench. I use it to remove wheel lugs, axle nuts, rusted-brake and -exhaust components. It made quick work of the hardware on some large deck beams that were bolted together. It's portable; really easy to tote around. I wish I had bought one sooner.
customer_reviews.author: David K.

customer_reviews.title: and the electric is better. As far as electric half inch guns go
customer_reviews.text: owned this impact for almost 2 years. This thing is badass, I've compared it next to my mac composite air impact @120psi, and the electric is better. As far as electric half inch guns go, it's this one, the mac one, or the Milwaukee fuel. Anything else is junk.
customer_reviews.author: erik

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and I have been told at least a dozen times how amazing this is and how much they use it. It has been over a year now and it's still going strong, battery life is super long and it works superbly. Very much worth every penny spent on it! They have been doing an engine swap and says this has saved them too many times to count and has not once had a single issue.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: I love this impact wrench. It has done everything from changing tires, torqueing large bolts, and driving large lag bolts. This tool does it with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Big Dog

customer_reviews.title: Beast! Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Lug nuts, crank pulley, everything you can do with a pneumatic impact without needing an air tank. A little heavy after a while, but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: AlanM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Impact Wrench! Must have if you work on your vehicles.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! This impact wrench removed the lug nuts off my Jeep at ease. Made it so easy to rotate my tires and also remove my tires to install the fenders. Definitely packing this in my Jeep when off roading in case I get a flat. Will make changing that flat a piece of cake.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a monster!!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the $$ I'm just wow impressed with this impact driver I took my Odyssey both axle in less than 10 second work for everything you put on 100% recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Felix

customer_reviews.title: Time, life, knuckle saving tool. Purchase it when on deal.
customer_reviews.text: My friends swing by my place to remove any frozen bolts caused by Rust belt salt. I get compliments on this Big-A tool. I got it for $250 with battery. Can't beat that price. Took exhaust bolts, suspension bolts, any bolt like butter.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Tamez

customer_reviews.title: Love this tool have 2 of them and the 3/4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this tool have 2 of them and the 3/4 drive Has more power than my snap on that was three times the coin Have broke lug nuts on semi truck tires Love the dewalt product!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Reliable.
customer_reviews.text: It had been a year that I was mulling over this purchase. Finally I did it when it was on sale on prime day. My intent was to bring it with me when I travel in the unfortunate event of a tire blow-out. Sure enough, my first road trip, I had a blow-out. I was happy to have bought this tool. Fits my lifestyle well. The only comparable tool that I know of, would be the Milwaukie brand impact wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Domenico

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this to my boyfriend and he loves it. I put 4 stars for weight because it was a little heavier than I expected but I’m not the one using it.
customer_reviews.author: Steph R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - powerful
customer_reviews.text: This tool was able to break some bolts that my Dewalt 700 pds. torque could not handle. Amazing for a battery operated tool. It is a bit heavy though.
customer_reviews.author: Kaypee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas. He loves it and has used it numerous times and said this tool will last him for years and years to come. It's a little heavier than some other brands, but those other bands couldn't handle the work this one can.
customer_reviews.author: D. P.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful and has removed seized suspension bolts from a midwest F150 that I did not think would be possible. The battery life is really impressive. Overall great tool and would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Used many times already
customer_reviews.text: Have had to take this impact wrench to the field to remove then put on another tire. Great portability and the battery life has been great even when it was below zero temps.
customer_reviews.author: From the farm

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelming- does not have the power it claims
customer_reviews.text: Underwhelming. Used the heck out of it during rebuild of my Jeep. It isn’t as powerful as claimed
customer_reviews.author: SteampunkPhotos

customer_reviews.title: Get it if you want the best!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks!! Compared to my electric impact and my friends 4 year old Milwaukee and it makes them look like 1/4" ratchets vs. 1/2" ratchet performance. All my devices are now Dewalt. They really have cornered the market on being one of the best if not the best on all battery operated tools. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Just a small problem
customer_reviews.text: Product seems durable like most DeWALT stuff. Ordered off Amazon So I Should have returned this for another one because the forward reverse button feels really loose. I don’t use often just rotating my tires mostly. Don’t stay over in selected position very well. It’s a pain. Gonna take it to a DeWALT service center to see what’s up.
customer_reviews.author: Ryno

customer_reviews.title: Buy this to work smarter not harder
customer_reviews.text: Massive torque, no compressor needed. Used to repair suspension on my truck. Even using universal joints and extensions with the impact sockets Dewalt 20v DCF899 had no trouble removing bolts at 220 ft/lb +. If you are a home mechanic like me you will appreciate how easy the tool makes removing and replacing bolts when the vehicle is only at Jack stand height.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get one!
customer_reviews.text: It’s worth every cent spent! This gets used more frequently than I like to admit to remove trailer tires.
customer_reviews.author: Cuppycake

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Good heavy duty impact. I use it to take off lug nuts when I’m in a location with no access to air tools. It’s dewalt so you know that means quality
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S

customer_reviews.title: This is a great gun i love the differt tork this is a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gun i love the differt tork this is a real mans tool heavy but it works very well! wey better than stap on .This is my second one the frist one had a bad battery. But great service from amazon! I am very glad i got it.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Dob

customer_reviews.title: Scary powerful
customer_reviews.text: Great battery operated impact. Very powerful. Not light but why would you expect it to be?
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: Great tool that makes quick work of suspension bolts
customer_reviews.text: Powerful enough to round off three extremely sized lug bolts after 30 or so seconds of blasting away. Gentle enough to remove small screws. Great tool that makes quick work of suspension bolts!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Radaj

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome
customer_reviews.text: I can’t be happier. I’ve wanted one of these for awhile now. Amazon has it on a sale price and I bit the bullet and bought it. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: G. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Used it straight out of the box without charging it ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it straight out of the box without charging it, and took off 4 rusty VW lugnuts that my 1/2 inch drive air tool would not budge.
customer_reviews.author: David Moretz

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love it, but in my hurry to buy it screwed up, thought I ordered the hog ring style but didn't ....get the hog ring or you will have to worry to get the socket off. But a great impact
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EWALT DCF899P1 20V MAX
customer_reviews.text: for ma battery impact wrench this is unreal. I am able to remove lug nuts from my farm tractor. no problem
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for car maintenance
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help remove bolts and lug nuts on my 1971 MGB - it is perfect for the task. I'm only sorry that I didn't but this earlier because it's mae my life so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Mel.B.T

customer_reviews.title: too big,too heavy
customer_reviews.text: love this gun,very powerful for the automotive industry, loosen up nuts on all cars and E.S.V.,but it's too big and extremely heavy for the everyday use
customer_reviews.author: TUNDRA2012

customer_reviews.title: Powerful tool!
customer_reviews.text: I love this drill. Works perfectly for the bolts on my truck. Was able to take off the bolts to the exhaust, wheels and front crossmember with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: case
customer_reviews.text: love the dewalt works great on taking the lugs off my car and truck. Ionly had to put it on number two to torque down the lugs . Case is little cheap should be in hard case. But over all Love it works great for me .Yes would recommend it to all. would buy again if need to.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Beast
customer_reviews.text: Used it to do brakes on my Ram 1500 Mega Cab. Took the caliper bolts off like nothing. Works great on lugnuts and a few other jobs I did. Good tool so far.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to have for working on the car
customer_reviews.text: Great tool to have for working on the car. It takes off lug nuts without any struggle. I've used this on many jobs and it really holds its weight. Very reliable. Not to mention the battery goes for days sometimes 2 weeks without charging. This is a wonderful 0roduct that I will definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: YOGANAND RAMEN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Did a lot of research as I couldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Did a lot of research as I couldn't get my tractor blades off. Bent a wrench trying to get the bolts off / no success. 2 days later I received the Dewalt DCX MAX XR impact wrench. 10 seconds on each bolt ; I felt so powerful. Getting tires off of vehicles will be a snap !!!
customer_reviews.author: cajunclaw

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal torque! Now I don't to have to buy ...
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal torque! Now I don't to have to buy a bigger compressor because this tool does the job for tires and big bolts.
customer_reviews.author: rubecat

customer_reviews.title: Workhorse
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine. Pretty heavy but I won't complain due to the power and battery life this tool provides.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marcelo

customer_reviews.title: All in all I'd say it's a great deal and a very powerful wrench
customer_reviews.text: Seems to have all the power I need. I don't know that it has 1200 ft/lbs breakaway torque. It failed to break a few 1-3/8 lug nuts for me but to be fair, those particular nuts also resisted my 1/2 inch pneumatic. All in all I'd say it's a great deal and a very powerful wrench.
customer_reviews.author: the Lumberjack

customer_reviews.title: Better than air or electric
customer_reviews.text: Use this to change a flat tire on my RV while traveling. Really powerful. Better than air or electric power
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Barber

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Darn good product people. The retaining pin is pretty good. When doing the research I run across some people that clearly prefer retaining ring but the pin is super nice. Seems like Dewalt put in softer spring so is super easy to put stuff in and out. Or maybe I am just super strong. But for me the pin is a breeze to use no issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Professional

customer_reviews.title: power,power,power !
customer_reviews.text: more power than I know what to do with . Greater control plus no dragging air hoses under and around . The tool is perfect in spaces where it's hard to get too. I find as I get older I want less aggravation and more power in my tools, this doe's the job!
customer_reviews.author: francis p. schoman

customer_reviews.title: Torque an more torque
customer_reviews.text: Ton of torque and Dewalt quality = win. I should have bought this one a while ago.
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: Trigger sucks
customer_reviews.text: Gun is amazing for torque and usefulness. I used it every day in my tire shop for about 1 year and then the trigger started messing up. I was hoping to find just a trigger for it to replace but turns out Dewalt made the trigger and motor all one unit so replacement part is as much as a new tool only....So, for me my next gun will be the Milwaukee Brushless.
customer_reviews.author: Will @ The H Group

customer_reviews.title: Great for Automotive Work
customer_reviews.text: It’s rapidly become my favorite, no rusty bolt can withstand it (so far). Now if only DeWalt made a ratchet in this line with he same battery pack....
customer_reviews.author: Zaps

customer_reviews.title: Great tool. Great price
customer_reviews.text: Light weight. Will remove automotive lug nuts with ease. Great battery life. Compact to get in tight spots. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Farrell Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Damn good product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I keep it in my car for changing tires
customer_reviews.author: Vegas Critic123

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tool. Used it and it has great power! Would recommend it for all your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has the power to get really tough jobs done. ...
customer_reviews.text: Has the power to get really tough jobs done. Only negative is that it is too large to even get in not so small spaces (wheel well of a pickup truck).
customer_reviews.author: Guy who bought this

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It took off most nuts that I needed it to. It also put them on with ease. I like the 3 different adjustments so I can put a nut on with high torque or very little torque so as not too over tighten the nuts. I would recommend this product to anyone who needs to have a versatile tool that will do most automotive jobs.
customer_reviews.author: R. L.

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive tool
customer_reviews.text: I am not easily impressed and not often surprised but this impact did both this thing has loads of power and a very long run time a bit heavy but you do not have to drag a hose around best purchase I have made in a long time
customer_reviews.author: Eugene M.

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome bangs out just about everything I threw at it must buy
customer_reviews.author: Samuel T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast for those stubborn hard to remove bolts!
customer_reviews.author: squint0241

customer_reviews.title: Makes me feel like a man
customer_reviews.text: Sell your compressor and get one of these. Made short work of my lug nuts for a snow tire changeover.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Great fro changing tires.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to put on spacers for my Jeep Wrangler. Took 4 tires off and installed 4 spacers. I then put on 4 different tires. Battery went dead on the last one. Don't know if it is good for a professional but great for me aat home. Worth the money for use around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Decker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Don’t hesitate to buy this I use it almost daily for work and after over a year of use and abuse the drill and battery still works like it came out of the box well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Morehouse

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!!!
customer_reviews.text: Used it To change out 8 wheels in my trucks and it breaks the lugs free with ease. Battery is still on full. It’s lightweight for me because I don’t need to lug out air hoses and compressors. I recommend it to anybody looking!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gun for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with overall quality, it is a very strong gun. On the first position, the weakest, it torqued a 17mm lug bolt to about 110 ft lb, so that gives you an idea on power. It is a very powerful gun on 3, Id say just as strong if not more than the Snap On it replaced (2014 lithium) 5ah batteries will take on and off about 200 lugs with ease, probably more, worth the slight price increase. Has fallen off the lift from around 4 feet and suffered no damage, well see how easy parts are to find and replace.
customer_reviews.author: John A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Excellent torque for removing and tightening lug nuts. Lug nuts are securely fastened for everyday driving ( measured with torque wrench ). Compact carrying case makes it idea to take on road trips as a just-in-case measure.
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

product_meta.title: DEWALT 20V MAX XR Impact Wrench Kit, Brushless, High Torque, Detent Anvil, 1/2-Inch (DCF899P1)
product_meta.description: Style:Impact wrenchThe DEWALT DCF899P1 20v MAX XR Brushless High Torque 1/2" Impact Wrench Kit w. Detent Anvil, 5.0Ah features a brushless motor which is designed to provide superior run-time, performance and durability. It has a heavy-duty impact mechanism with a max torque at 700 ft./lbs. for best-in-class torque with the most demanding applications, with a max breakaway torque at 1,00 ft./lbs. This tool features a 3-speed selector switch that allows for application specific torque/drive control. It also has a LED work light with a 20 second delay that will provide visibility when working in dimly lit spaces,. Even though this tool is ergonomic and lightweight, it can handle a 6-8ft drop and the anvil is resistant to shearing and breaking! A battery fuel gauge indicator will inform you about the level of charge available in the battery pack. The detent pin offers strong socket retention so to help avoid dropping sockets in various construction situations. Includes: 1) DCF899 Impact Wrench, 1) DCB205 5.0ah Battery and 1) Multi-voltage charger. Do not abuse the cord. Never use the cord for carrying, pulling or unplugging the power tool. Keep cord away from heat, oil, sharp edges or moving parts
feature_bullets: Heavy duty impact mechanism with max torque 700 feet/ pounds; breakaway torque 1,200 feet/ pounds
